Articles.Content:
How do I build a planet buster?
My kerbal, Xerbol, was finally recovered from Eve after 17 years.

He wants to get "revenge" on the purple planet.

So, for no reason at all, I wanna know how to make a planet buster.

 

In all seriousness, I want to make a planet buster to make a music video to go with "Portal - Want You Gone", and I thought Xerbol would be a good kerbal to base it off of as he's been stranded on Eve for 17 years.

Edited May 23, 2021 by krblman
What is it you want to accomplish? You know KSP planets can't be destroyed or even affected? I could drop a big rocket on the surface to go boom but that's the only affect it would have.

Install Kopernicus and mod a busted planet consisting of melted core, orbiting rocks, and a ring.

 

 

Remove Eve.
